Episode.title: Legacy: Episode 2
Episode.summary: Reeling from a deadly explosion, Locke and Section 20 regroup at a new crib in Bangkok, with Scott and Stonebridge tasked to bring in McQueen â€“ who is also targeted by Changrok, captain of a corrupt SWAT unit at the Bangkok PD. The boys soon realize that Chloe's kidnapping is the tip of a much larger plot, one involving a North Korean crime syndicate, Office 39, and it's ruthless Bangkok leader, Lee Dae-Ho
